channel.title: LoginBox+Button Background purple color Wont Disapear?
channel.description:
Hi, i just downloaded this LoginBox+Button and The Background was white befor (but still didnt work) so i changed the color to light purple but it still doesnt go away ='( how can i fix Thank you.
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2eqfgxw.png[/img]

item.title: LoginBox+Button Background purple color Wont Disapear?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

Try making the pink color transparent. The guy who gave you that client probably added the transparent code shit that makes your client fail just so someone can use GIFs instead of the cache. Anyway, I would consider checking if that’s the problem then get me back on it.

Read full topic

item.title: LoginBox+Button Background purple color Wont Disapear?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

p00n scape:

no dude, you know nothing about Rsps… Your just spamming for posts…

LOL? Kid, excuse my french but go fuck yourself. You have no idea what you’re talking about apparently. There is a fucking code where you removed the loginbox that still thinks its there. And if you want to be spoonfed, gtfo to run3l0cus because I’m not gonna waste my time with someone like you.

BTW I love how I’m spamming for posts when We have the same status and you only have +6 more reps. You can just quit rsps and go back to playing real rs if you don’t know how to change login boxes.

You want to be an asshole, go ahead. Check Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.
Honestly… -.-"
